column4: is it wrong to type: "gcc -c test.c -o test" to compile the file test.c into the program test?
stdio.h doesnt seem to be valid
what header file should I use then for std output/input ?
error: stdio.h: No such file or directory, Im probably doing something wrong
how do I compile the file test.c into the program test in gcc?
gcc -o test test.c; if you use -c you will compile an object file that needs to be linked later
